segments.text: Mary , why are you so tired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go to the personnel market every day , and put a lot of energy into it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you think about applying for a job on the Internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On the Internet ? I have never tried that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's very convenient and very popular now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So how to apply for a job on the Internet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just get online and send your application through email to the employer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But how can I know which employer is hiring ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could place your job hunting information on the Job Wanted channel on a recruitment website .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will the employers see my information ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If they think you are a fit , maybe they will contact you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it safe to job hunt on the Internet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you log in some formal websites , it must be very safe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will give it a try at once .
segments.speaker: S2
